item.title: 存储统一的概念模型
item.description: 文章URL： https://jack-vanlightly.com.com.com.com/blog/2025/2025/2025/8/8/21/a-conecceual-modelifife Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44972406 点：8 ＃评论：0

Me and Guy (@guyb3) built ChartDB to generate ER diagrams from your database without a need of any database access (via query/sql/dbml).我们从开源版本开始，在看到大量使用后，我们决定制作一个云版本。我们的OSS启动（1y前） - - Embed ERDs into docs, dev portals, or Miro/Notion etc.- Collaborate in real-time (with live cursors like Figma)- Keep diagrams always in sync with your database- Organize large, messy schemas without pain- Export DDL in multiple SQL dialects (solved deterministically)- AI assistant to头脑风暴并生成新的模式对象或模式更改我们设计了它，以便与数据库一起工作不像是一件琐事，更像是一个创意过程。会喜欢反馈 - 尤其是从处理混乱的模式或过时的文档的团队中。 https://app.chartdb.io
Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44972238 Points: 33 # Comments: 6
